sentences.sContent: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.sCn: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.sContent: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.sContent_eng: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.sCn: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.sContent: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.sCn: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

remMethod.val: gall(看作hall, 大厅)+ery(表地点的名词后缀)→陈列美术品的大厅→画廊

trans.tranOther: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art
